NK040(thi)038:1: // de nas brtan ma skyong ba ni gtor ma la bshal chus bran la /
NK040(thi)038:3: brtan ma skyong mdzad ma srin rgya mtsho'i tshogs //
NK040(thi)038:4: dpon g.yog mang po sman phran mang po bcas //
NK040(thi)038:5: 'dir gshegs rgyan gyi gtor mas phrin las mdzod //
NK040(thi)038:7: bdud mo bzhi dang gnod sbyiin sman mo bzhi //
NK040(thi)038:8: 'khor bcas sil snyan drod rtags sgra dang bcas //
NK040(thi)038:9: 'dir gshegs brgyan gyi gtor ma 'di bzhes la //
NK040(thi)038:10: slob dpon bka' bzhin bod khams bu ltar skyongs //
NK040(thi)038:11: bsgrub byed bstan 'dzin skyes bu'i phrin las mdzod //
NK040(thi)038:15: e dam ba ling+ta kha hi /
